FuncDef: This command specifies the Python script for the specified RADIUS packet type in the specified direction.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the message type of the event. Values-access-request, access-accept, access-reject, accounting-request, accounting-response, access-challenge, disconnect-request, change-of-authorization-request.
Specifies whether the event is incoming or outgoing.
Specifies the name of the Python script up to 32 characters, that will be used to handle the specified message.
